body.p:
Washington -- June 2nd 1862
Hon: B Magoffin
Govnr of Kenty:
My Dear Sir,

According to your request I have this morning enclosed to Mr Stanton, Secretary of War, all the papers you sent me for that purpose -- I accompanied them with a letter from myself to the Secretary, a copy of which I inclose with this, --
I also enclose, as you requested, copies of the original letters of Judge Fowler to you, & of Coln: Noble to Judge Fowler, -- Which originals you sent to me, & I have enclosed to the Secty: of War.

In great hast, I am,
Very Respectfully,
Yr's &c
J J Crittenden
